activities.name: Eiffel Tower Visit
activities.description: Visit the iconic Eiffel Tower with skip-the-line access. Enjoy breathtaking views of Paris from the observation decks.
activities.address: Champ de Mars, 5 Avenue Anatole France, 75007 Paris
activities.tips: Book in advance to avoid long queues. Best views at sunset!

activities.name: Disneyland Paris
activities.description: Magical day at Disneyland Paris with rides, shows, and character meet-and-greets perfect for the whole family.
activities.tips: Arrive early! Download the Disneyland app for wait times and show schedules.

activities.name: Louvre Museum Family Tour
activities.description: Interactive family-friendly tour of the Louvre featuring the Mona Lisa, Egyptian artifacts, and other masterpieces with engaging storytelling for kids.
activities.tips: Kids love the Egyptian mummy section! Keep the tour short for younger children.

activities.name: London Eye Experience
activities.description: 30-minute rotation on the iconic London Eye with spectacular 360-degree views of London's skyline.
activities.address: Riverside Building, County Hall, Westminster Bridge Road, London SE1 7PB
activities.tips: Book sunset time for magical views. Kids love identifying landmarks from above!

activities.name: Natural History Museum
activities.description: Explore dinosaurs, blue whales, and interactive exhibits. Free admission with special exhibitions available.
activities.tips: Don't miss the T-Rex and the blue whale! Allow extra time for the gift shop.

activities.name: Tower of London Tour
activities.description: Historic fortress with Crown Jewels, Beefeater tours, and fascinating medieval history.
activities.tips: Kids love the armor displays and hearing stories from the Beefeaters!

activities.name: Tokyo Disneyland
activities.description: Experience the magic of Disney with unique Japanese touches. Seven themed lands with attractions for all ages.
activities.tips: Get there early for popular rides! Try the unique Japanese Disney snacks.

activities.name: TeamLab Borderless
activities.description: Immersive digital art museum with interactive installations that kids will love exploring.
activities.tips: Wear comfortable clothes you can move in. The kids' area is amazing!

activities.name: Ueno Zoo
activities.description: Japan's oldest zoo featuring pandas, elephants, gorillas, and over 350 species.
activities.tips: Don't miss the giant pandas! There's a fun petting zoo area for younger kids.

activities.name: Sagrada Familia Tour
activities.description: Skip-the-line tour of Gaudí's masterpiece with audio guide and tower access.
activities.tips: Tall kids will enjoy climbing the tower. The colorful windows are magical!

activities.name: Barcelona Aquarium
activities.description: One of Europe's largest aquariums with walk-through shark tunnel and Mediterranean species.
activities.address: Moll d'Espanya del Port Vell, s/n, 08039 Barcelona
activities.tips: Kids love the shark tunnel and touch pools! Plan for the gift shop.

activities.name: Park Güell
activities.description: Gaudí's colorful park with mosaics, architecture, and great city views. Perfect for family photos!
activities.tips: Lots of walking and stairs. Kids love the mosaic dragon fountain!

activities.name: Central Park Bike Tour
activities.description: Family-friendly bike tour through Central Park with stops at famous landmarks.
activities.tips: Great way for kids to explore! Stop at the playgrounds along the way.

activities.name: American Museum of Natural History
activities.description: World-famous museum with dinosaurs, space exhibits, and the butterfly conservatory.
activities.address: 200 Central Park West, New York, NY 10024
activities.tips: Don't miss the dinosaurs and the blue whale! The planetarium is amazing.

activities.name: Statue of Liberty & Ellis Island
activities.description: Ferry trip to Liberty Island and Ellis Island with audio tours and museum access.
activities.tips: Book crown tickets well in advance if interested. Lots of stairs!

activities.name: Colosseum Family Tour
activities.description: Kid-friendly gladiator tour of the Colosseum with storytelling and interactive elements.
activities.address: Piazza del Colosseo, 1, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
activities.tips: Kids love hearing about gladiators! Bring water, it can get hot.

activities.name: Vatican Museums & Sistine Chapel
activities.description: Fast-track access to Vatican Museums with family-friendly highlights tour.
activities.tips: Dress code enforced. Keep younger kids engaged with scavenger hunt!

activities.name: Burj Khalifa Observation Deck
activities.description: Visit the world's tallest building with spectacular views from levels 124 and 125.
activities.address: 1 Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Blvd, Dubai
activities.tips: Book sunset slot for magical views. Kids amazed by the height!

activities.name: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo
activities.description: Walk-through tunnel with sharks and rays, plus interactive underwater zoo.
activities.tips: Combine with Dubai Mall shopping. Kids love the penguin colony!

activities.name: Gardens by the Bay
activities.description: Futuristic gardens with Supertree Grove, Cloud Forest, and Flower Dome.
activities.tips: Don't miss the evening light show at the Supertrees! Bring a light jacket for the conservatories.

metadata.notes: Sample data for testing purposes. Prices and availability subject to change. All activities are family-friendly with age recommendations.
